resources.string: AndroidManifest.xml is a mandatory file in every Android project, containing essential information about the application.?
Fragments in Android can exist independently without being hosted by an activity.?
The Android Manifest file contains information about your app, such as its name, icon, and required permissions.?
Services in Android are always running in the foreground?
The public keyword in Java allows access to a variable or method from anywhere within the project?
The ActionBar in Android provides a consistent navigation interface that is typically placed at the top of an activity\'\s window.?
